globals.title: Robert W. McGee - Official
globals.description: Robert W. McGee is an Amazon Best-Selling Novelist who writes political fiction from an individualist perspective. His latest works include Justifiable Homicide - A Political Thriller, Annie and the Senator, The TSA vs the People, and the Iraqi Girl Trilogy.
globals.keywords: Robert W McGee, Iraqi Girl, The TSA vs The People, Justifiable Homicide, Author, Novelist
